sentences: Ma helistasin tasulisele telefoniliinile, kus saab vestelda erootilistel teemadel.
Tasuta telefonid on sageli koht kus inimesed v√µivad vestelda.
context: The word 'vestelda' comes from the verb 'vestelda' which means to engage in conversation, particularly on erotic themes over phone lines. In Estonian context, it often refers to paid telephone services where people can call and chat about intimate topics or listen to erotic content.
